mapper.insert: insert into commodity_info (id, name, price, first_level_lable, secondary_lable, tertiary_label, is_del, create_time, modify_time, feature) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{price,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{firstLevelLable,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{secondaryLable,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tertiaryLabel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isDel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{feature,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
